chinese: 天作高山、大王荒之。彼作矣、文王康之。彼徂矣岐、有夷之行、子孫保之。
english: Heaven made the lofty hill,And king Da brought [the country about] it under cultivation.He made the commencement with it,And king Wen tranquilly [carried on the work],[Till] that rugged [mount] Qi,Had level roads leading to it.May their descendants ever preserve it!
